isis.stitle: CAB: 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 AND 8600 MODELS - INSTALL - CAB DOOR VENT WINDOW

svcsubproc.title: Install Front Cab Door Vent Window on Standard Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500 and 8600 Models, Extended Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500 and 8600 Models and Crew Cab for 7300, 7400, 7500 and 7600 Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 77 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position lower cab door vent window mounting pin (Item 7, View Circle B) in the lower cab door vent window hinge (Item 8, View Circle B). With front cab door vent window (Item 1) still open, swing it out away from front cab door vent window opening so the upper cab door vent window hinge (Item 5, View Circle A) is accessible and carefully push the upper cab door vent window mounting pin (Item 6, View Circle A) into upper cab door vent window hinge, driver side shown.

Close front cab door vent window (Item 1). Position vent window latch pivot (Item 3) on cab door vent window frame (Item 4) and install two torx head screws (Item 2), driver side shown. Tighten to 53 to 70.5 Lbf-in (6 to 8 N•m).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side front cab door vent window.
